title: Panic repeatedly on version 0.11.1

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
On one machine I seem to be getting panics frequently. It may be related to upnp. Strange thing though is my other machine on the same network, same syncthing version where things seem fine.

Attaching the panic log.

```
[XVPOO] 05:22:28 INFO: syncthing v0.11.1 (go1.4.2 linux-amd64 default) unknown-user@syncthing-builder 2015-04-26 11:10:14 UTC

[XVPOO] 05:22:28 INFO: Starting web GUI on https://0.0.0.0:8080/
```
